tool.name: Protein Calculator

regex.description: Protein sequence contains invalid character(s). Please enter a valid Protein Sequence.
Protein sequence should have a minimum length of 10 residues. Please enter a valid Protein Sequence.
Protein sequence should have a maximum length of 3000 residues. Please enter a valid Protein Sequence.

tool.command:
cp -r '$__tool_directory__/templates' . && python '$__tool_directory__/protein_calculator.py' #if $name: --name '$name' #else: echo 'Error: Protein name is required.' >&2 exit 1 #end if
#if $sequence: --sequence '$sequence' #else: echo 'Error: Protein sequence is required.' >&2 exit 1 #end if

param.label: Protein sequence
param.help: Sequence to be processed. Protein sequence should have a minimum length of 10 residues.

tool.help:
This Python-based tool will determine protein properties based on the amino acid sequence, which it summarizes in an HTML report and Plotly graph.
.. class:: warningmark
The maximum allowed sequence is set at 3.000 amino acids.
.. class:: infomark
Usage: ``protein_calculator.py [-h] --name NAME --sequence SEQUENCE``
Arguments:
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
--name Name of the protein, in text format
--sequence Sequence to be processed, in text format
-v, --version Show the version of the tool and exit
